Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A lawn game consisting of a series four of metal hoops arranged in sequence on the lawn, the object of which is to use the wooden playing mallet to hit the clay ball through the hoops in five strokes or less.

A lawn game consisting of a series of metal hoops arranged in sequence on the lawn, the object of which is to use the wooden playing mallet to hit the clay ball through the hoops in five strokes or less.
Painted blue, this modestly sized clay ball is very hard and perfectly spherical.
Iron hoops are arranged in sequence for this game of lawn golf.
Iron hoops are arranged in sequence for this game of lawn golf.
A wooden mallet, about three feet tall with a round wooden head and a leather-wrapped grip.
